title: How come so much public is restricted around the Brooks building at 18 Water St.  The River Walk is blocked and signs on the gathering area at the foot of Dock St. say, Private"."
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2015/04/why-is-the-riverwalk-blocked-behind-the-j-w-brooks-building/
